briefTitle: Study to Evaluate AMG 162 in the Prevention of Postmenopausal Osteoporosis

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Eligibility Criteria

\- Postmenopausal women with Osteopenia (lumbar spine bone mineral density T-score between 1.0 and -2.5)

outcomeMeasures.title: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Femoral Neck Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Trochanter Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Distal 1/3 Radius Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Body (Without Head) Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Distal Radius Trabecular Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Quantitative Computerized Tomography (QCT).

outcomeMeasures.title: Distal Radius Cortical Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Quantitative Computerized Tomography (QCT).

outcomeMeasures.title: Distal Radius Total Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Volumetric Bone Mineral Density Assessed by Quantitative Computerized Tomography (QCT).
